import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Plus, Search, Filter, UserPlus, Building, Calendar, TrendingUp, TrendingDown } from 'lucide-react'; const Teams = () => { const [selectedDepartment, setSelectedDepartment] = useState('all'); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [showAddMember, setShowAddMember] = useState(false); // Mock data const departments = [ { id: 'design', name: 'Design', memberCount: 6 }, { id: 'engineering', name: 'Engineering', memberCount: 12 }, { id: 'product', name: 'Product', memberCount: 4 }, { id: 'marketing', name: 'Marketing', memberCount: 5 }, { id: 'sales', name: 'Sales', memberCount: 8 } ]; const teamMembers = [ { id: 1, name: 'Sarah Chen', email: 'sarah@company.com', role: 'Senior Designer', department: 'Design', signals: 4.8, lastOneOne: '2024-01-15', status: 'green', avatar: 'SC' }, { id: 2, name: 'Mike Johnson', email: 'mike@company.com', role: 'Frontend Engineer', department: 'Engineering', signals: 4.6, lastOneOne: '2024-01-12', status: 'green', avatar: 'MJ' }, { id: 3, name: 'Emma Davis', email: 'emma@company.com', role: 'Product Manager', department: 'Product', signals: 4.5, lastOneOne: '2024-01-10', status: 'yellow', avatar: 'ED' }, { id: 4, name: 'Alex Kim', email: 'alex@company.com', role: 'Marketing Specialist', department: 'Marketing', signals: 4.4, lastOneOne: '2024-01-08', status: 'green', avatar: 'AK' }, { id: 5, name: 'David Wilson', email: 'david@company.com', role: 'Sales Manager', department: 'Sales', signals: 4.3, lastOneOne: '2024-01-05', status: 'red', avatar: 'DW' }, { id: 6, name: 'Lisa Brown', email: 'lisa@company.com', role: 'UX Designer', department: 'Design', signals: 3.8, lastOneOne: '2024-01-03', status: 'red', avatar: 'LB' } ]; const filteredMembers = teamMembers.filter(member => { const matchesDepartment = selectedDepartment === 'all' || member.department.toLowerCase() === selectedDepartment; const matchesSearch = member.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || member.email.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()); return matchesDepartment && matchesSearch; }); const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'green': return 'text-green-400'; case 'yellow': return 'text-yellow-400'; case 'red': return 'text-red-400'; default: return 'text-white/60'; } }; const getStatusIcon = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'green': return 'ðŸŸ¢'; case 'yellow': return 'ðŸŸ¡'; case 'red': return 'ðŸ”´'; default: return 'âšª'; } }; return (
{/* Header */}

Teams

Manage your team members and departments

{/* Filters */}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} className="glass-input w-full pl-10" />
{/* Department Overview */}
{departments.map(dept => (

{dept.name}

{dept.memberCount} members

))}
{/* Team Members Grid */}
{filteredMembers.map(member => (
{member.avatar}

{member.name}

{member.role}

{getStatusIcon(member.status)}

{member.signals} signals

Department {member.department}
Last 1:1 {member.lastOneOne}
Status {member.status.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + member.status.slice(1)}
Signal trend
{member.signals > 4.5 ? ( ) : ( )}
))}
{/* Add Member Modal */} {showAddMember && (

Add Team Member

)}
); }; export default Teams;
